title: Slow cooker Pulled Pork Sandwiches
directions: Place meat in the slow cooker.
In a small bowl, combine the broth, 1/3 cup of Worcestershire sauce, and 1/3 cup hot sauce. Pour over the meat and cook on low for 6 hours.
Remove pork and discard the liquid. Put the meat back in the pot and shred with a fork.
In a bowl, mix the ketchup, molasses, 1/2 cup Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 cup hot sauce, and mustard.
Pour over the shredded meat and cook on high for 30 minutes.
Serve on burger buns with a side of coleslaw or salad.
ingredients: Louisiana-style hot sauce [1/3 cup, plus 1/4 cup]
1 cup molasses [you can use 3/4 cup for less sweetness]
